Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east left shoulder and left lane are closed. Traffic backups are approximately 4.0 miles.

Description: On US-58 East in the County of Carroll, in the vicinity of Red Hill Rd; Rt. 674N/S (Carroll County), motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. Lane closures exist.
